item.title: Client Won't Start
item.dc:creator: @Dragon99999 Dragon99999
item.description:
@Dragon99999 wrote:

Storm Powner:

it can’t find the cache, look in signlink.java whats the name of the cache should be and were you need to place it

[code] public static final String findcachedir()
{

	return "./cache/";
}[/code]

Put it in the ‘cache’ folder (matched case) in the client folder. Still nothing.

item.title: Client Won't Start
item.dc:creator: @Dragon99999 Dragon99999
item.description:
@Dragon99999 wrote:

So I just downloaded/extracted a fresh 377 client and added a fresh 377 cache into the client folder, then compiled fine and ran.

Problem is, once the client starts, it gets stuck and says “connection problem - Will retry in xx seconds” (xx being different every time)

Where do I look to fix this problem?

EDIT: To help anyone, it was stuck on ‘connecting to web server’ and this is the only code I found with that text

[code]String s = “Unknown problem”;
method13(20, true, “Connecting to web server”);
try
{
DataInputStream datainputstream = method31(“crc” + (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D) + “-” + 377);
Class50_Sub1_Sub2 class50_sub1_sub2 = new Class50_Sub1_Sub2(true, new byte[40]);
datainputstream.readFully(class50_sub1_sub2.aByteArray1453, 0, 40);
datainputstream.close();
for(int i1 = 0; i1 < 9; i1++)
anIntArray837[i1] = class50_sub1_sub2.method526();

            int j1 = class50_sub1_sub2.method526();
            int k1 = 1234;
            for(int l1 = 0; l1 < 9; l1++)
                k1 = (k1 << 1) + anIntArray837[l1];[/code]
